import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Admin.css'; export default function Admin(){ const [tab, setTab] = useState('users'); return (

Admin Dashboard

Manage users, bookings, airlines, sellers, and reports.

Users

View and manage registered users, adjust reward balances, or deactivate accounts.

Bookings

Search, view, or cancel bookings and issue refunds or adjustments.

Airlines & Flights

Create and update flights, schedules, and carrier information.

Sellers

Review seller accounts, approve new sellers, and manage listings.

Reports

Generate reports: bookings, revenue, points issued, and system health.

) }
